name: Game Show Party
description:
It's a Game Show Party, and everyone is invited! Featuring favorites The Price Is Right®, Press Your Luck™ and Family Feud®, the Game Show Party bundle is everything you need for family fun and games on your PlayStation®3 system. Play multiplayer on one PS3™ or online through PlayStation®Network (Family Feud® & Press Your Luck™ only). TV game show competitions have never been so entertaining!

FEATURES
"True-to-TV" Game Show Experiences:
Includes all the favorite elements of the classic game shows The Price Is Right®, Press Your Luck™ and Family Feud®. Play on authentic TV show stages with all the familiar music and sound effects you know and love.

3 Modes of Play:
Play Solo, enjoy Multiplayer mode played on one PS3™ or play online through PlayStation®Network (Family Feud® and Press Your Luck™ only). Tons of questions keep gameplay fresh!

Bonus Items:
Unlock bonus customization options as reward for progress in the games.


PRICE IS RIGHT®, FAMILY FEUD® & PRESS YOUR LUCK® are registered trademarks of FremantleMedia Operations BV. © 2010 FremantleMedia North America. All Rights Reserved. Licensed by FremantleMedia Enterprises.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
